trans-unit.source: Provides access to system event notifications.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取系統事件告知。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The SystemEvents class provides the ability to respond to specific types of system events.
trans-unit.target: SystemEvents 類別提供特定類型的系統事件回應的能力。

trans-unit.source: When a system event is raised, any delegates attached to the event are called using the thread that monitors for system events.
trans-unit.target: 系統事件引發時，任何附加至事件的委派會呼叫使用的執行緒，監視系統事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should make any calls from your event handlers thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您應該要從您事件處理常式的執行緒安全的任何呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If you need to call a system event that is not exposed as a member of this class, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.InvokeOnEventsThread%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要呼叫系統事件與這個類別的成員未公開，您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.InvokeOnEventsThread%2A>方法。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.InvokeOnEventsThread%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not perform time-consuming processing on the thread that raises a system event handler because it might prevent other applications from functioning.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 不會引發的系統事件處理常式，因為它可能會讓其他應用程式無法正常運作的執行緒上執行耗時的處理。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some system events might not be raised on [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 某些系統事件可能不會引發上[!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to verify that your application works as expected on [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 請務必確認應用程式能如預期般在[!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new window timer associated with the system events window.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的視窗計時器相關聯的系統事件 視窗。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the interval between timer notifications, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 指定的間隔時間計時器通知，以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the new timer.
trans-unit.target: 新的計時器的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The interval is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.
trans-unit.target: 目前的內容下不支援系統事件告知。

trans-unit.source: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.
trans-unit.target: 例如，伺服器處理序，可能不支援全域系統事件告知。

trans-unit.source: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed, or the attempt to create the timer did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試建立系統事件視窗執行緒失敗，或建立計時器的嘗試不成功。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user changes the display settings.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者變更顯示設定。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION]> 因為這是靜態事件，您必須處置應用程式，或將會造成記憶體流失時中斷連結事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.
trans-unit.target: 目前的內容下不支援系統事件告知。

trans-unit.source: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.
trans-unit.target: 例如，伺服器處理序，可能不支援全域系統事件告知。

trans-unit.source: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立系統事件視窗執行緒嘗試不成功。
